players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "Bob is not acting suspiciously, he's trying to mislead us."
You: "Let's keep the discussion light and avoid drawing more attention to myself. I'll play along with Diana's alibi, hoping it will confuse everyone."

players.name: Diana
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "Bob is not acting suspiciously, he's trying to mislead us."
Bob: "Let's keep the discussion light and avoid drawing more attention to myself. I'll play along with Diana's alibi, hoping it will confuse everyone."
